name: Fruity Rice Salad and Orange Vinaigrette
author: Uncle Ben's
summary: UNCLE BEN'S® Ready Rice® serves as the base for an extremely versatile salad perfectly suited to accompany any meal!  The Original Rice can become the Ready Basmati Rice or Whole Grain Brown Rice, dried cranberries can become golden raisins, pecans can become pistachios or walnuts, celery can become water chestnuts or apples!  Use your imagination!
ingredients: 1 (8.8 ounce) pouch UNCLE BEN'S® Ready Rice® Original Long Grain
¼ cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Ocean Spray® Craisins®)
.063 cup toasted pecans, broken into pieces
1 tablespoon mayonnaise, or more to taste
2 tablespoons blood orange white balsamic vinegar
1 pinch salt and pepper to taste
directions: Microwave rice according to package instructions; refrigerate until chilled, about 30 minutes
Add celery, dried cranberries, pecans, green onions, and red onions
Whisk together white balsamic vinegar, olive oil, Dijon mustard, honey, and garlic
Refrigerate for at least an hour to allow flavors to blend
